casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Henry MYERS and Jesse Coleman. No. 660P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 29, 2005. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Myers and Coleman. *551Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of November 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of November 2005."
